card.addFirstCard: Add your first card to start managing your expenses easily.
card.protected: Protected by advanced encryption & fraud monitoring.

common.footer: Built with care • FinFlow © 2025 — Designed for demos & learning
common.str_ReadMeExplanation: A small, modern fintech playground — designed to demonstrate pragmatic architecture, reliable payments, and clear developer experience. Think of this page as the project's living README.
common.str_DemoExplanation: FinFlow is a focused wallet & payments demo combining a .NET backend, Postgres storage, and a Next.js frontend. It showcases real-world patterns: payment webhooks, transactional integrity, testing with Stripe, and a developer-friendly codebase suitable for portfolio/demo use.
common.str_ManageYourWallets: Manage your wallets, track your cards and achieve your financial goals.
common.str_NoWallets: You don't have a wallet yet.
common.str_CreateNewWallet: You can start by creating a new wallet.
common.str_CreateFirstWallet: Create your first wallet to manage your budget and track spending in one place.
common.str_WelcomeToPortal: Welcome to your FinFlow User Portal
common.str_Greeting: Manage your wallets and achieve your financial goals.
common.str_Roadway: Sign up and start your roadway.
common.str_FillDetail: Fill out the details below to register.
common.str_MissionExplanation: Simplify everyday money flows. Provide a lightweight, secure wallet experience where users can top up via Stripe, track transactions, and run simple financial workflows. Prioritize clarity, correctness, and developer ergonomics.
common.str_ListMission3: Clear separation of concerns (API / Application / Infra)
common.str_ArchitectureExplanation: Clean Architecture inspired layout: API layer (ASP.NET), Application services (commands/handlers), Domain entities, Infrastructure (EF Core, repositories). Frontend built with Next.js + Tailwind + shadcn/ui.
common.str_AddCard: Add your first card to start managing your expenses easily.
common.str_WelcomeDescription: Thanks for joining FinFlow. Start by adding a new wallet.
common.str_NoTransactionExplanation: Your transactions will appear here once you make your first transaction.

common.str_ManageInfo: Manage your personal information and security preferences.
common.str_ProtectAccount: Protect your account with an extra layer

common.str_UseShortcuts: Need to move money fast? Use these shortcuts.
common.str_WalletUpdateDetails: Update your wallet details. This is like updating your bank account nickname, description, or status.
common.str_OrganizeWallet: Organize your finances by creating a wallet for different needs — like Daily Expenses, Vacation Savings or Crypto Investments.
common.str_ChooseName: Choose a name that helps you recognize the purpose instantly.
common.str_SelectCurrency: Select the main currency for this wallet.
common.str_NoEnoughData: Not enough data to show statistics yet.
common.str_FinancialCharts: Financial charts will be displayed here

quotes.str2: Manage your money, shape your future.

tips.str1: Give your wallet a name that makes sense in daily life (e.g. Travel Fund, Rent Savings).
tips.str2: Keep balances realistic to track your actual spending.
tips.str3: You can disable the wallet anytime by toggling Active.
